body.p: allows you to edit MathML equations and see the results in a preview window. For a more specialized MathML editor, you can install MathFlow.

To configure the MathML editor or to enter your MathFlow license informaiton, and go to Editor Edit modes Author MathML
Editor Edit Modes / Pages Author MathML . You can configure the following parameters:

ul.li: Equation minimum font size - The minimum size of the font used for rendering mathematical symbols.
MathFlow installation directory - The installation folder where looks for MathFlow Components (the MathFlow SDK).
MathFlow license file - The license forMathFlow Components (the MathFlow SDK).

MathFlow preferred editor - A MathML formula can be edited in one of three editors of the MathFlow Components (MathFlow SDK): structure editor, style editor, and simple editor. More documentation is available on the MathFlow SDK website.
